definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]

sentences.english: The perfect flower to lift spirits or to simply bring joy to someone's day.
sentences.chinese: 完美的花鼓舞精神或乾脆帶來歡樂的人的一天。

sentences.english: It is the best to classify the patent document into the technology field. That the patent document is not classified is practicable.
sentences.chinese: 而專利公報與專利索引宜入技術領域或乾脆不分類。

sentences.english: Mary's shoes were full of water so she took then off.
sentences.chinese: 瑪莉的鞋都是水所以她乾脆脫掉。

sentences.english: A few who run shops have turned their storefronts into missing person displays.
sentences.chinese: 有些開店的人乾脆把門面改成了失蹤人口展覽。

sentences.english: Make Mo and queried many answers, imperial concubine's rain was thin to response very simply.
sentences.chinese: 弄墨又問了許多問題，妃雨菲答得很乾脆。

sentences.english: The mourners around me give me sideways glances or just stare.
sentences.chinese: 我周圍的哀悼者斜着瞥我一眼或者乾脆直盯着我看。

sentences.english: If you do not want glyphosate simply buy organic food.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不想要草甘膦乾脆購買有機食品。

sentences.english: If I were beaten at home, there was absolutely nothing that I could do about it.
sentences.chinese: 我要是在家裏捱揍呢，那是乾脆一點辦法也沒有了。

sentences.english: You can try using a moisturizer or cream -- or wearing long-sleeved shirts.
sentences.chinese: 使用潤膚霜，精華霜，或者乾脆穿長袖吧。

sentences.english: Just to the headmaster asked a leave, to the town" Zhu doctor" there to have a look.
sentences.chinese: 乾脆向校長請了個假，到鎮上“朱神醫”那裏去看看。

sentences.english: Never put off until tomorrow what you can avoid altogether.
sentences.chinese: 今天你就可以賴掉而乾脆不做的，不要等到明天。

sentences.english: Jason, why don't you just go over and talk to her?
sentences.chinese: 傑森，你怎麼不乾脆走過去跟她說說話呢？

sentences.english: People searched garbage dumps for food or ate weeds.
sentences.chinese: 人們去垃圾桶中尋找食物或者乾脆喫野草。

sentences.english: Many people simply skip over words they do not understand.
sentences.chinese: 良多人乾脆把他們所不熟悉的詞跳過去無論它。

sentences.english: Pisces skips the whole thing to compose poetry to the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座乾脆跳過步驟，直接對月吟詩去了。

sentences.english: Some become boomerang kids , only enjoy the life.
sentences.chinese: 有的乾脆做起“啃老族”，只享受生活。

definition: as for/as to/to go so far as to
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext/also written 借口[jie4 kou3]
from now on/in the future/time to come
